# 2025 Queensland International II

Adam Walton
| champmd= Joshua Charlton /  Patrick Harper
| champws= Kimberly Birrell
| champwd= Miho Kuramochi /  Zheng Wushuang
| before_year=2025
| before_name=Queensland International
| main_name=Queensland International

}}
The 2025 Brisbane QTC Tennis International II was a professional tennis tournament played on hardcourts. It was the second edition of the tournament which was part of the 2025 ATP Challenger Tour and 2025 ITF Women's World Tennis Tour. It took place in Brisbane, Australia between 3 and 9 February 2025.

Other entrants
The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw:
*  Jacob Bradshaw
*  Jason Kubler
*  Pavle Marinkov
The following players received entry from the qualifying draw:
*  Jake Delaney
*  Matt Hulme
*  Kosuke Ogura
*  Keisuke Saitoh
*  Hikaru Shiraishi
*  Arthur Weber
The following player received entry as a lucky loser:
*  Hayato Matsuoka
Champions
Men's singles
* Adam Walton def.  Jason Kubler 7–6(8–6), 7–6(7–4).
Women's singles
* Kimberly Birrell def.  Maddison Inglis 6–2, 4–6, 7–6(7–2).
Men's doubles
* Joshua Charlton /  Patrick Harper def.  Matt Hulme /  James Watt 4–6, 7–6(7–5), [12–10].
Women's doubles
* Miho Kuramochi /  Zheng Wushuang def.  Tessah Andrianjafitrimo /  Malene Helgø 7–6(8–6), 6–3.
